headline: Want Decades of Passive Income? 3 Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Investing in the stock market is an excellent way to build long-term wealth.  One tried-and-true approach to generating passive income from your investments is dividend investing.  A comprehensive study conducted by Ned Davis Research and Hartford Funds found that over 50 years (ending in 2023), dividend-paying stocks have delivered an impressive annual return of 9.17%.
